name: cbig_gpan_global2000
title: Zonation results data for global analysis for year 2000.
description: Datapackage (1 out of 4) for the publication 'Global protected area expansion is compromised by projected land-use and parochialism'. NEEDS TO BE EXTENDED.

resources._comment: Is there a schema analogue for rasters?
IN 1.0-alpha DATA IS NOT FORMATTED PROPERLY

fields.name: Prop_landscape_lost
fields.description: The proportion of the landscape removed.

fields.name: min_prop_rem
fields.description: The minimum proportion of species distribution that is remaining in the landscape, thus the situation of the worst-off species.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem
fields.description: The average proportion over all species.

fields.name: w_prop_rem
fields.description: The weighted average proportion of all species.

fields.name: ext-1
fields.description: The average extinction risk of species as landscape is iteratively removed (as calculated from the species-area relation using parameter z.

fields.name: ext-2
fields.description: The weighted extinction risk where species-area extinction risk has been weighted by the species weights.

fields.name: Species/Group 1
fields.description: The proportion of distribution remaining for species.

fields._comment: This would continue for all species/groups
